data.system_settings: macOS Sierra 10.12.6, Macbook Air, Firefox Quantum 61.0.2 (64-bit)
data.actual_result: The amount of days is lower and X is a little higher, also it's best noticable on Firefox. But also happens on the desktop app
data.expected_result: The days ago is centered with the X
data.short_description: The "X" and amount of days ago under Purchase Date aren't centered
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have bought Nitro before - Go to the billing tab - Open a purchase you have done - Observe the "X" and amount of days ago under "Purchase Date"
